1-1:Planet Ragol.Name: 1-1:Planet Ragol
1-1:Planet Ragol.info: Go down to Ragol's surface and report on the conditions there.
1-1:Planet Ragol.Author: Sonic Team

1-2:Torrential Woods.Name: 1-2:Torrential Woods
1-2:Torrential Woods.info: Eliminate the hostile animals prowling around the Central Dome area!
1-2:Torrential Woods.Author: Sonic Team

1-3:Subterranean Den.Name: 1-3:Subterranean Den
1-3:Subterranean Den.info: Nobody has come back from beneath the Central Dome alive...
1-3:Subterranean Den.Author: Sonic Team

2-1:Infernal Cavern.Name: 2-1:Infernal Cavern
2-1:Infernal Cavern.info: A cave has been found beneath Ragol. Go and investigate.
2-1:Infernal Cavern.Author: Sonic Team

2-2:Deep Within.Name: 2-2:Deep Within
2-2:Deep Within.info: A bizarre monument, has been found within the caverns…
2-2:Deep Within.Author: Sonic Team

2-3:The Mutation.Name: 2-3:The Mutation
2-3:The Mutation.info: Gather data on the creatures that live underground.
2-3:The Mutation.Author: Sonic Team

2-4:Waterway Shadow.Name: 2-4:Waterway Shadow
2-4:Waterway Shadow.info: Mysterious "thing" seen in the underground waterway.
2-4:Waterway Shadow.Author: Sonic Team

3-1:The Facility.Name: 3-1:The Facility
3-1:The Facility.info: Why is there a large-scale facility underneath Ragol?
3-1:The Facility.Author: Sonic Team

3-2:Machines Attack.Name: 3-2:Machines Attack
3-2:Machines Attack.info: Annihilate the machines that are down in the mines!
3-2:Machines Attack.Author: Sonic Team

3-3:Central Control.Name: 3-3:Central Control
3-3:Central Control.info: Find the control room to the underground facility!
3-3:Central Control.Author: Sonic Team

4-1:The Lost Ruins.Name: 4-1:The Lost Ruins
4-1:The Lost Ruins.info: Break the seal to the ruins and get inside!
4-1:The Lost Ruins.Author: Sonic Team

4-2:Buried Relics.Name: 4-2:Buried Relics
4-2:Buried Relics.info: Get data on the writing from the stone monument in the ruins!
4-2:Buried Relics.Author: Sonic Team

4-3:Hero & Daughter.Name: 4-3:Hero & Daughter
4-3:Hero & Daughter.info: A secret request from the Principal. What could he want?
4-3:Hero & Daughter.Author: Sonic Team

4-4:The Tomb Stirs.Name: 4-4:The Tomb Stirs
4-4:The Tomb Stirs.info: Exterminate the enemies and secure a path through the ruins!
4-4:The Tomb Stirs.Author: Sonic Team

4-5:Dark Inheritance.Name: 4-5:Dark Inheritance
4-5:Dark Inheritance.info: Get to the bottom of the ruins! The answers must lie there!
4-5:Dark Inheritance.Author: Sonic Team

Battle Training.Name: Battle Training
Battle Training.info: Find a hunter who is working down on Ragol.

Magnitude of Metal.Name: Magnitude of Metal
Magnitude of Metal.info: A valuable commodity on Ragol was lost?!

Claiming a Stake.Name: Claiming a Stake

Journalistic Pursuit.Name: Journalistic Pursuit

The Fake in Yellow.Author: Sonic Team

Native Research.Name: Native Research

Forest of Sorrow.Name: Forest of Sorrow
Forest of Sorrow.info: The data from the capsules is unusual...
Forest of Sorrow.Author: Sonic Team

Gran Squall.Name: Gran Squall
Gran Squall.info: Gran Squall, a pleasure boat, departed before the explosion. Find the survivors.

The Lost Bride.info: Cicil got fat by using too many recovery items. Help her diet!

Secret Delivery.Name: Secret Delivery
